s.text: The analyses comply with the informational requirements of the sections including the number and sizes of the small entities affected and the alternatives considered to reduce the burden on small entities.

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, entitled "Bank Holding Companies and Change in Bank Control (Regulation Y)" (Docket Nos.

Our review indicates that the Board of Governors complied with the applicable requirements.
Subject: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System: Bank Holding Companies and Change in Bank Control (Regulation Y)
cc: Mr. Donald J. Winn Assistant to the Board Board of Governors Federal Reserve System

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, entitled "Bank Holding Companies and Change in Bank Control (Regulation Y)" (Docket Nos.
cc: Mr. Donald J. Winn Assistant to the Board Board of Governors Federal Reserve System
As an independent regulatory agency, rules promulgated by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System are not subject to review under the executive order.
The official responsible for GAO evaluation work relating to the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System is Jean Gleason Stromberg, Director, Financial Institutions and Markets Issues.
